name: Centro di Educazione Ambientale Serra Guarneri

reviews.text: I was with my family in this place, not far from Palermo (it takes about one hour by car) and very close to Cefalù, to spend my Easter Day. It was a great experience, I'd say out of the blue! Actually, although I was born and brought up in Sicily, I'd never heard about previously...and it's a shame! At our arrival, thanks the warm welcoming we immediately felt at ease. I'd like to mention, particularly, Giuseppe, a very skill guide who led us for a hiking in the forest (60 minutes up hill walk among breath-taking landscapes) and Valeria (who prepared for all of us a jummy and genuine meal). Words can be not good enough in order to describe how exciting is the place and I guess it definitely deserves a stop-over if you come to Sicily and want to experience the happiness to be in touch with nature, between blue sea and green mountains. The fare is absolutely affordable and if you fancy staying for a longtime, you can get the chance to sleep in one of the rooms they've recently renovated in a simple rural style.
reviews.title: A hidden gem where you can unplug for a while and chill out enjoying the nature

aka: Centro Di Educazione Ambientale Serra Guarneri Cefalu, Sicily
